## Module DOM.XHR

Types for the [WHATWG XMLHttpRequest Living Standard](https://xhr.spec.whatwg.org/#interface-formdata).

#### `XMLHttpRequest`

``` purescript
data XMLHttpRequest :: *
```

An `XMLHttpRequest` object instance.

#### `FormData`

``` purescript
data FormData :: *
```

A `FormData` object instance.

#### `ProgressEvent`

``` purescript
data ProgressEvent :: *
```

A `ProgressEvent` object instance.
